channel.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Mod Problem
channel.description:
Well, I've recently started replaying Shadow of Chernobyl again, and I wanted to install a mod to improve the gameplay. Now I've found two mods that seem to upgrade the game very excellently, but I can't decide one which one to use! [url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/lurk[/url] [url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/stalker-complete-2009[/url]
I know some people here have either seen/or used these mods before, and I was wondering if someone could help me decide which one is better.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Mod Problem
item.dc:creator: Repzik
item.description:
I think I may try to install them both at some point, but right now I’ve gone with Complete 2009.

Read full topic

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Mod Problem
item.dc:creator: Nintyuk
item.description:
Well i don’t know much about it but the stalker complete 2009 is what im using after being recommended it by Rock Paper Shotgun

Read full topic

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Mod Problem
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Damn it. I need to install the 2009 mod.
